description:
Looking at the staff’s leftover sunburn marks from the beach gives Dino inspiration for a limited time jungle coffee shop. Miu does a special cosplay for the event that’s a huge hit with the customers. On the downside, Kaho and Akizuki have an accident involving all the plants in the temp café.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: バナナにイチゴで, いそがしい
